metamagics.name: Centering
metamagics.description: Reduce drain from spellcasting or adept powers through focus and ritual.

metamagics.name: Cleansing
metamagics.description: Remove background count penalties from an area.

metamagics.name: Divining
metamagics.description: Gain cryptic insights about the future through ritual.

metamagics.name: Geomancy
metamagics.description: Shape and manipulate mana lines and power sites.

metamagics.name: Invoking
metamagics.description: Summon more powerful spirits beyond normal limits.

metamagics.name: Masking
metamagics.description: Hide your magical nature from astral perception.

metamagics.name: Shielding
metamagics.description: Add dice to spell defense for yourself or others.

metamagics.name: Quickening
metamagics.description: Make a sustained spell permanent using karma.

metamagics.name: Anchoring
metamagics.description: Create magical anchors that trigger spells under conditions.

metamagics.name: Flexible Signature
metamagics.description: Alter your astral signature to avoid identification.

metamagics.name: Absorption
metamagics.description: Absorb drain from spells as temporary power.

metamagics.name: Reflecting
metamagics.description: Reflect spells back at their caster.

metamagics.name: Attunement
metamagics.description: Attune to a specific location for bonuses.

metamagics.name: Extended Masking
metamagics.description: Extend masking to cover foci and spells.

metamagics.name: Power Point
metamagics.description: Gain an additional power point for adept powers.

metamagics.name: Sympathetic Linking
metamagics.description: Create ritual links to targets for remote spellcasting.
